name: cradle song
lyric:
Go to sleep now dear love neath roses above
Sweet blossoms white and red shall bloom by thy bed

When the dawn lights the skies open wide thy dear eyes
When the dawn lights the skies open wide thy dear eyes

Go to sleep now dear love neath roses above
Sweet blossoms white and red shall bloom by thy bed

When the dawn lights the skies open wide thy dear eyes
When the dawn lights the skies open wide thy dear eyes
